body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
It would be great if the edit option and author info is available for every idea page at the bottom. 

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Build a component similar to this,

![edit_comp](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70762571/196037633-54a697a4-4791-4eed-b60e-2a6a8140d267.jpg)

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Feel free to ask your queries and suggestions.

**Additional context**
_No response_
title: Need edit page option and info about the author
author: roopeshsn

body:
The UI of Conception is very raw. Design a minimalist UI with a good preference for colors and fonts. Chakra UI is used in this project.

![screenshot-conception vercel app-2022 10 02-16_23_54](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70762571/193450520-dd93f8b3-5129-4c3e-8c90-6feee87c5cdb.png)
title: UI Enhancement
author: roopeshsn

body: Conception is an Idea sharing platform. If anyone searches on the internet that matches the ideas in Conception then the posts should rank on the first page of the search engine (Google, Bing, Brave, etc.)
title: SEO optimization
author: roopeshsn

body: As of now, the backend supports the auth APIs like register, login, refresh, logout, etc. Create API documentation for these APIs.
title: Write API Documentation
author: roopeshsn

body: TypeScript offers a great developer ecosystem to write clean code with best practices. So, It has been decided to change the existing frontend codebase to TypeScript.
title: Migrate frontend (React) codebase to TypeScript
author: roopeshsn

body: TypeScript offers a great developer ecosystem to write clean code with best practices. So, It has been decided to change the existing backend codebase to TypeScript.
title: Migrate backend codebase to TypeScript
author: roopeshsn

body: TypeScript offers a great developer ecosystem to write clean code with best practices. So, It has been decided to change the existing codebase to TypeScript.
title: Rewrite code to TypeScript
author: roopeshsn

body: Most of the components do not have unit tests. It is good to have them tested!
title: Add unit tests
author: roopeshsn

body: Conception is an idea-sharing platform. If you have any ideas you can contribute by writing your ideas in a Markdown file. If you're new to open source this will be a good starting point. Check out the CONTRIBUTING.md file to know more about how to contribute. Your idea should be explained in a minimum of 150 words.
title: Contribute your ideas to Conception
author: roopeshsn
